divs: Sighting DetailsI have photo's so far I have developed 4 rolls most pictures reveal something.I have several very good pictures showing the disc.My pics were taken with a 35mm with a 200 max zoom. most at a distance of maybe 3 to 5 miles guessing but some closer.I have more film approx.4 rolls not developed. I will do this soon.I live very close to BIA.I'm curious if you have other reports from that time frame or others.I have convinceing evidence and a story.The evidence has only been shown to my 2 adult children.I apologize but I'm not ready to tell the story or reveal all my photo's yet.I'm curious if you have anything that I can collaborate with or work with you on with my photo's.So far what I have developed contains alot.I still see the star like ones on a continuous basis in this area.I would appreciate anything you could throw me on info..I'm watching documenting,and photograghing anything I can.But thereis definately things going on around Bangor International Airport.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Bangor
There were no other sightings in Bangor on or around August 8th 2008
Summary: I watched events over a week period,but have been noticing events since Dec. 27th of 2007
